title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XI, pt. 400 - Hearing Rules Of Procedure
content:

State Regulations
§ 400.1 - Intent and purpose
§ 400.2 - Office of Administrative Hearings
§ 400.3 - Conduct of adjudicatory proceedings
§ 400.4 - Commencement of disciplinary proceedings
§ 400.5 - Subpoenas
§ 400.6 - Motions
§ 400.7 - Affidavits
§ 400.8 - Evidence and proof
§ 400.9 - Service of rules
§ 400.10 - Representation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XI, pt. 400

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§91, 94-a; General Business Law, §§89-o, 390, 403, 433; State Administrative

Procedure Act, §§ 204, 301; L. 2000, ch. 547, §
399-z

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
